website_summaries.verdict: A great set for trying key bareMinerals products to help you create the perfect backdrop for other cosmetics.
pros: Set includes 4 products – foundation base, foundation, mineral veil, and a brush
Made by a top-selling company that makes quality mineral makeup
Products last a long time for trial sizes
cons: Not as many shade choices available compared to the full-sized products by the brand
Somewhat drying, and the powder tends to settle in fine lines

website_summaries.verdict: A four-piece trial-size collection of popular Bare Minerals products that build a smooth, flawless complexion.
pros: Contains foundation, SPF, finishing powder, and a beautiful finish brush
Great for anyone wanting to try out this leading brand
cons: Kit offers fewer shade selections than the full-size products

customer_reviews.title: I love Bare Minerals products
customer_reviews.text: I love Bare Minerals products. This one has great coverage, and I love the serum that is included. However, as a woman in her 60s this product does leave my skin feeling dry.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Bankens

customer_reviews.title: Tiny products. ... do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The products are really five-star but I gave them 3 because of the size. Each little jar is approximately the size of a silver dollar ...width and height. ... a teaspoon of powder in side. ..not even packed tightly. I am going to try another brand next order.
customer_reviews.author: alishav

customer_reviews.title: Great Trial Sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the mineral veil that came with the foundation. I tend to get an oily t zone and this helps a lot with that. I have found that I like to put the veil on first then my foundation. If I do it in the opposite order, my makeup looks too dark for some reason even though I use the same amount each time.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Caradine

customer_reviews.title: having face issues sucks. There is no help for us in this ...
customer_reviews.text: As a guy, having face issues sucks. There is no help for us in this market. This product helped me A TON with my face redness, and eased a lot of my anxiety for having way too much redness on my face because I knew it looked great all day long with even just a small application. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: pko

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I have been using this for over a week now and can tell a huge difference in my skin! I will never go back to greasy, Creasy, pore-clogging makeup. This stuff is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Shades are a tad bit lighter on skin!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure as to how the color would work for me. I am very fair with cool undertones but have many dark freckles. Bare Minerals is a fabulous powder foundation if you "swirl, tap and buff" as directed (the more you buff in, the more natural and smooth the minerals look on skin). Be advised that the shades go on just a slight bit lighter than pictured. I could have gone a shade or two darker.
customer_reviews.author: BEAN

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings....
customer_reviews.text: Like finish but not enough coverage if problematic skin. Also seems dry/powdery especially up close-even when did exactly what tutorials say. Also scared to touch face since would move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product as described by broke my skin out
customer_reviews.text: Gave decent coverage and was what I expected except it broke my skin out and caused several large breakout within one week of wearing. If you have sensitive skin, be CAREFUL. The buffing brush that this comes with is tiny and too small for full face application in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this: "I love it!! Its the perfect travel size."
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, non-irritating, good brush too!
customer_reviews.text: This small container last a long time. I love the brush also. I think the brush is part of the key to applying this. Other brushes don't distribute the product as well. I'm not sure what the mineral veil is for. I don't use that.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this product in ten years and wanted to give it another try. It provides light coverage that helps even my complexion for a casual/ natural look. I have fair and sensitive skin. I loved the brush because it is soft enough for me to buff and blend without irritation. I loved the primer too- one pea sized drop goes a long way. I wasn’t sure which color to choose but “fairly light” worked out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya A

customer_reviews.title: Great size for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing the trial size Bare Minerals. I have used this product for years so I already know the amazing benefits of using it. I buy the trial size because I travel a lot for work and these are the perfect size to take on the road. This set is very packable. It comes with a compact travel brush for application and even a mini primer.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: my cant live without make up go to!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and nothing comes close. I do use the bareminerals barepro foundation with it.
customer_reviews.author: vikpik

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! The shade is perfect for my skin and I love the new packaging so I don't waste so much product. The brush is perfect too for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Original is best!
customer_reviews.text: I love Bare Minerals original. It’s what I started with years ago, and I still haven’t found anything better. The color is a perfect match, and I can build coverage easily.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Very light & doesn't cause breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure it covers as well as other powders but it is light, airy & doesn't cause my skin to break out. Overall, I think it's okay but not fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Miss R

customer_reviews.title: Color Not as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Vss as our for money and travel size very good. However I’m very disappointed with this product. I ordered original mineral veil which should be a very light light product it came in orangey. Didn’t realize I could return this product. Not happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Beware of size of this item!!
customer_reviews.text: Very small size . Very little product in jars . Seems more like a sample size or travel size . Would not have bought this if I had realized that . ..feel cheated. I bought the original starter kit years ago and this is not it! The original kit was a full size kit with a real brush !
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: NOT a repeat purchase
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be great. It is a great base if you do not sweat. The makeup does not hold up if you sweat or plan to be outside in 90 degree or higher temperatures. Save yourself the aggravation of runny, clumpy, splotchy effects of the makeup when you sweat! This is not a repeat purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TigerLIlly

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Bare minerals is the best makeup ever!! This was the best price I've ever paid for a starter kit. Shipping was on time. And true to skin tone. Wouldn't use anything else but this!!
customer_reviews.author: nichole bernardo

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them but not a lot of coverage
customer_reviews.author: Fancy

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Christene Bates

customer_reviews.title: Love Bare Minerals!
customer_reviews.text: Love Bare Minerals! I was glad to find this cheaper on Amazon than in stores so I could try it out before buying a full size container. I haven’t used anything else on my face since purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description!!
customer_reviews.text: The sticker label that was placed on the bottom says fairly light 03, which is what i wanted, but instead got light 08 which is too warm for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: If you have acne like me this product helps you and covers spots and acne a lot. I liked it so much that now I bought the line. But color matte
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This product caused me to break out. Face cleared up after I discontinued use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect trial package to find out if you like your product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My forever makeup
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fact that it’s natural and doesn’t clog the pores. So light weight and gives a natural look even though it’s full coverage.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Happy I choose to go with bare minerals. Travel size is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to try out
customer_reviews.text: Wish products were a little larger but overall great value for the price. Love the coverage of this makeup and will absolutely be ordering the large version from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Heard

customer_reviews.title: Broken cap. Leaked
customer_reviews.text: I didn't try it. Came with broken cap so I bought a different product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, sizes have lasted me over a month now, satisfied with the coverage, minimal breakouts since starting. Overall happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved this product. It was everthing I expected Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight. Feels good on face
customer_reviews.text: Durable make up. Doesn't feel heavy. Been using for years and so have 2 of my daughters. Breathable and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: KWLFF

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to try the original Bare Minerals. Comes with a cute little brush. Great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Definitely liked using all these in this kit! Concealer needs work though, it makes spots on the face shiny when light hits them just right.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Dearest

customer_reviews.title: Always The Best
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a bare minerals fan. This was perfect for my granddaughter!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the lightness and coverage. Not too expensive and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hall

customer_reviews.title: Returned after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Product was heavy on skin, looked caked. I returned after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Scikatie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats BE
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats BE, and I find I use less makeup as I get older. So this little set will probably last me for a year. Great prices. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Writer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter kit. Authentic product. Great deal. Has amazing coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Walli

customer_reviews.title: I love the product and despite the box coming damaged everything ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and despite the box coming damaged everything inside the box was fine nothing was cracked. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chompesch

product_meta.title: Bare Minerals Nothing Beats Org Gsk Fairly Light Set,, 0.16 Ounce ()
product_meta.description: This 4 piece kit has everything you need for the ultimate Bare beauty complexion. Get a natural, luminous finish and all-day good-for-skin coverage with the powerful combination of prime Time foundation primer, original foundation SPF 15 and mineral Veil translucent finishing powder, and beautiful finish brush. Set includes: Prime Time foundation primer (0.5 Ounce/ 15 milliliter), original foundation SPF 15 in fairly light (0.07 Ounce/ 2 gram), original mineral Veil finishing powder (0.07 Ounce/ 2 gram), and medium beautiful finish brush.
feature_bullets: This 4 piece kit has the essentials you need for a beautifully Bare complexion. Prime Time foundation primer (0.5 oz/ 15 mL)

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
